text: This image was taken in the Old Port of Montreal, a district located in the old part of Montreal that features quirky architecture with a European style. The area is also known as the Little Paris of North America.
This video was recorded by Jiaxi Yang on August 27, 2023 at Halifax Public Park.

This image is Montreal Underground City, Montreal' Underground City (Montreal Underground City) is an underground shopping street in Ville Marie, Montreal, Canada's second-largest city, 17 kilometers long, with a total surface area of 4 million square meters, and 30 kilometers of pedestrian walkways.
Montreal' Underground City connects 10 metro stations, 2,000 stores, 200 restaurants, 40 banks, 34 movie theaters, 2 universities, 2 train stations and a coach station.
This video was recorded by Jiaxi Yang in Montreal and Quebec City with scenes from Montreal's Chinatown, Montreal's Rene Levesque Street and Quebec's Petit Champlain Street.
